text: Heliophorus androcles, the green sapphire, is a small butterfly found in India and Nepal that belongs to the lycaenids or blues family. ==See also== *List of butterflies of India *List of butterflies of India (Lycaenidae) ==References== * * Category:Heliophorus Category:Butterflies of India Category:Butterflies described in 1851
title: Heliophorus androcles
